description.value:
Access Varisian ethnicity or New Thassilon nationality

You have tattoos on your body corresponding to one of the ancient Thassilonian schools of magic. Choose one of the following schools of magic: abjuration (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shield]{Shield}), conjuration (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Tanglefoot]{Tanglefoot}), enchantment (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Daze]{Daze}), evocation (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Electric Arc]{Electric Arc}), illusion (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ghost Sound]{Ghost Sound}), necromancy (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Chill Touch]{Chill Touch}), or transmutation (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Sigil]{Sigil}). You can cast the associated cantrip (listed in parentheses) as an innate arcane spell at will.
